survey_brief: This survey aims to gather feedback from users of smart thermostats to understand their experience, satisfaction levels, and areas for improvement.

questions.question_text: How long have you been using a smart thermostat?
questions.client_notes: This helps segment users based on their experience level. Ensure response options cover all likely durations.

questions.client_notes: This identifies popular features to prioritize in future updates. Include an 'Other' option for completeness.
